description: Comprehensive testing plan using BrowserMCP to validate all website functionality

tasks.title: Website Foundation Testing
tasks.description: Test basic website functionality and navigation
tasks.details: Verify the website loads correctly, navigation works, and basic pages are accessible
tasks.testStrategy: Use BrowserMCP to navigate through all main pages and verify content loads

subtasks.title: Homepage Load Test
subtasks.description: Test homepage loads correctly with all components
subtasks.details: Navigate to homepage, verify HeroSection, SearchSection, and FeaturedProperties load properly

subtasks.title: Navigation Menu Test
subtasks.description: Test all navigation menu items work correctly
subtasks.details: Click through all navigation items, verify routing works, check active states

subtasks.title: Page Routing Test
subtasks.description: Test all page routes are accessible
subtasks.details: Navigate to /properties, /dashboard, /test-database, /test-image-system pages

subtasks.title: Footer and Links Test
subtasks.description: Test footer links and external references
subtasks.details: Verify footer loads, check all links are valid, test external references

tasks.title: Authentication System Testing
tasks.description: Test user authentication flows and security
tasks.details: Test login, signup, logout, password reset, and session management
tasks.testStrategy: Use BrowserMCP to simulate user authentication flows and verify security measures

subtasks.title: User Registration Test
subtasks.details: Fill out registration form, verify validation, check email confirmation flow

subtasks.title: User Login Test
subtasks.details: Test valid credentials, invalid credentials, locked accounts, remember me functionality

subtasks.title: Password Reset Test
subtasks.details: Request password reset, verify email flow, test reset token validation

subtasks.title: Session Management Test
subtasks.details: Test session timeout, logout functionality, secure cookie handling

subtasks.title: Role-Based Access Test
subtasks.details: Test admin, seller, and regular user access levels and restrictions

tasks.title: Property Management Testing
tasks.description: Test property listing, search, and management functionality
tasks.details: Test property creation, editing, search, filtering, and display
tasks.testStrategy: Use BrowserMCP to test property workflows from creation to display

subtasks.title: Property Creation Test
subtasks.details: Fill out property form, upload images, verify validation, check database storage

subtasks.title: Property Search Test
subtasks.details: Test search queries, filters (price, location, type), pagination, sorting

subtasks.title: Property Display Test
subtasks.description: Test property listing and detail pages
subtasks.details: Verify property cards display correctly, test detail page navigation, check image galleries

subtasks.title: Property Editing Test
subtasks.details: Edit existing properties, verify changes save, test image updates

subtasks.title: Property Approval Test
subtasks.details: Test admin approval process, status changes, notification system

tasks.title: Image System Testing
tasks.description: Test image upload, optimization, and CDN functionality
tasks.details: Test image uploads, transformations, optimization, and delivery
tasks.testStrategy: Use BrowserMCP to test image workflows and verify optimization features

subtasks.title: Image Upload Test
subtasks.details: Upload various image formats, test file size limits, verify storage in Supabase

subtasks.title: Image Optimization Test
subtasks.details: Test resize, format conversion, quality settings, verify optimization results

subtasks.title: CDN Delivery Test
subtasks.description: Test CDN image delivery and caching
subtasks.details: Verify images load from CDN, test caching headers, check performance

subtasks.title: Image Gallery Test
subtasks.details: Test gallery navigation, lightbox functionality, image switching

tasks.title: Admin Dashboard Testing
tasks.description: Test admin functionality and user management
tasks.details: Test admin dashboard, user management, analytics, and system configuration
tasks.testStrategy: Use BrowserMCP to test admin workflows and verify administrative functions

subtasks.title: Admin Authentication Test
subtasks.description: Test admin login and access control
subtasks.details: Test admin login, verify role-based access, test security measures

subtasks.title: User Management Test
subtasks.details: View user lists, edit user details, manage roles, test user activation/deactivation

subtasks.title: Analytics Dashboard Test
subtasks.details: View property analytics, user statistics, revenue reports, test data visualization

subtasks.title: System Configuration Test
subtasks.details: Test CDN settings, email configuration, security settings, backup options

tasks.title: Seller Dashboard Testing

tasks.testStrategy: Use BrowserMCP to test seller workflows and verify business functions

subtasks.title: Seller Property Management Test
subtasks.details: Test property creation, editing, status management, bulk operations

subtasks.title: Inquiry Management Test
subtasks.description: Test inquiry handling and response system
subtasks.details: Test inquiry notifications, response system, status tracking, follow-up reminders

subtasks.title: Seller Analytics Test
subtasks.details: View property performance, inquiry analytics, revenue tracking, market insights

subtasks.title: Communication Tools Test
subtasks.details: Test messaging system, email notifications, SMS alerts, communication preferences

tasks.title: User Experience Testing

subtasks.title: Notification System Test

subtasks.title: Mobile Performance Test
